official_title: A bill to award a congressional gold medal to Mrs. Ruth Owens in recognition of the late Jesse Owens' humanitarian contributions to athletics, public service, civil rights, and international goodwill.

summary.text: Authorizes the President, on behalf of the Congress, to present a gold medal to Mrs. Ruth Owens in recognition of Jesse Owens' humanitarian contributions to athletics, public service, civil rights, and international good-will. Authorizes appropriations. Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to sell bronze duplicates of the medal.

titles.title: A bill to award a congressional gold medal to Mrs. Ruth Owens in recognition of the late Jesse Owens' humanitarian contributions to athletics, public service, civil rights, and international goodwill.
